imdb.title: World Trigger
imdb.plot: A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to ...

episodes.title: New Start
episodes.plot: With Hyuse joining as a member, Mikumo Squad makes a fresh start as a new Tamakoma-2. Before the Rank Wars match, Tamakoma Branch's senior members, Michael Kronin and Yuri Rindo return to the branch. Yuri Rindo reveals Tamakoma's past.

episodes.title: Unrivaled
episodes.plot: Yuma and Hyuse fight together and make Kageura bail out, but the point goes to Suzunari-1, who dealt the most damage. Nevertheless, the two ride the momentum and take the fight to Suzunari-1.

episodes.title: Final Round
episodes.plot: At last, the Final Round begins. Chika is ferociously attacked by Ninomiya as soon as the match starts. Amid the intense attack, will she truly be able to shoot people for the sake of her teammates?

episodes.title: The Attack
episodes.plot: Aftkrator have ordered Galopoula to make Border stuck, so Galopoula's Expeditionary Force tries to break into Border HQ to destroy the ship for the expedition. Hyuse goes to meet them secretly in order to go back to his homeland.

episodes.title: Collision
episodes.plot: Inside the Border HQ, the battles begin: Gatlin and Ratarikov v. 4 strong attackers near the dock, Wen So v. Nasu and Kumagai in a hall. Outside the HQ, the teams struggle with some drones that move like humans. Meanwhile, Jin is surprised that Yotaro follows Hyuse with Raijinmaru.

episodes.title: Battle
episodes.plot: Border and Galopoula's Expeditionary Force play mind games reading each other's thoughts while fighting. Reghindetz is frustrated that his diversionary plan is not working.

episodes.title: Destiny
episodes.plot: Border fights off the enemy one by one, but Gatlin and Ratarikov have no intention of giving up on completing their mission. Hyuse talks to Reghindetz, and Yotaro finally catches up with him.

episodes.title: New Technique
episodes.plot: About the time Jin brought Hyuse into Border HQ, Tamakoma Second started the match against Katori Unit and Kakizaki Unit. Osamu and Chika support Yuma with their new techniques, and try to create momentum.

episodes.title: Strong Will
episodes.plot: Chika starts destroying buildings outside the area where Osamu has set the trap. When Yuma puts Kakizaki Unit in a corner, Kakizaki remembers his past and tries to fight back against Yuma with strong will.

episodes.title: Showdown
episodes.plot: Fumika Teruya prioritizes getting to Chika. Yoko Katori recalls the day her and Hana's fate changed as she fights against Osamu.

episodes.title: Negotiation
episodes.plot: The match was over. A party is held at the Tamakoma branch to celebrate their victory, and then Hyuse offers himself to join their team as the second attacker until he arrives in Aftkrator. Tamakoma Second accepts his proposal and Osamu begins negotiation with the higher-ups of Border.

episodes.title: Captain
episodes.plot: Osamu negotiates with higher-ups to get permission to include Hyuse in his team. Instead of allowing it, Commander Kido tells them that he is going to let Chika join the expedition force, regardless of their rank in the rank battles.

episodes.title: The Upper Rank
episodes.plot: Tamakoma Second fights in a match against Oji Unit and Ikoma Unit. They have only three matches left, and need to be in the top two. Meanwhile, Hyuse attends the Border enlistment ceremony.

episodes.title: The strong ones
episodes.plot: Yuma attacks Oji Unit. Besides, Ikoma and Mizukami catch up with them and Ikoma uses his special technique to strike them a hard blow. At a disadvantage, what are Oji unit's next tactics?

episodes.title: Rookie
episodes.plot: Yuma, Oji and Ikoma fight each other fiercely while the battle between the snipers comes to an end. Later, Hyuse shows Border agents that he is highly skilled in the use of sword to be considered a rookie.

episodes.title: Visitor from the Other World
episodes.plot: A gate to another dimension was burst open in Mikado City, and Neighbors started to invade our world. However, a mysterious organization, Border, fought them off using the Neighbors' technology called "Triggers". They'd been preparing for this day for a long time. 4 years have passed since then, a schoolboy named Yuma Kuga has transferred to Osamu Mikumo's class.

episodes.title: Neighbor and Trion Soldier
episodes.plot: Miwa Unit is confused because they find a large enemy drone that has already been destroyed. Meanwhile, Yuma tells Osamu that he came from Neighbor world.

episodes.title: Osamu Mikumo's Ability
episodes.plot: A gate opens at Osamu's middle school even though it's inside the security zone, and an enemy drone storms in. Osamu tries to fight it off, knowing that he is not strong enough.

episodes.title: Ai Kitora, A-Rank No.5 Agent
episodes.plot: Osamu defends Yuma, claiming that he alone defeated the enemy drone. An A-rank agent Ai Kitora criticizes him for breaking their rules.

episodes.title: Power Elite, Yuichi Jin
episodes.plot: A giant enemy drone appeared, and flies in circles over the city while dropping bombs. Will Kitora able to destroy it?

episodes.title: Chika Amatori's Side Effect
episodes.plot: The higher-ups of Border order a S-rank agent Yuichi Jin to find out why the unpredictable gates appear in the city. Yuma follows Replica's advice.

episodes.title: Miwa Squad's Assault
episodes.plot: Osamu has known that his friend Chika Amatori has something to attract Neighbors. She doesn't want to get anyone involved ever since she lost her brother and one of her friends. Yuma tells them why the Neighbors would come to this world.

episodes.title: The Black Trigger
episodes.plot: A-rank agents Shuji Miwa and Yosuke Yoneya make an assault on Yuma without even asking what happened. Osamu calls Jin to help.

episodes.title: The Organization Known as Border
episodes.plot: The higher-ups of Border disagreed on how to treat Yuma. The highest person in charge, Commander Kido orders Jin to kill Yuma and bring his black trigger to the headquarters.

episodes.title: Tamakoma Branch
episodes.plot: Jin encourages Yuma to join the Tamakoma branch. Yuma accepts it if he can team up with Osamu and Chika.

episodes.title: Each One's Determination
episodes.plot: Osamu hears from Replica about why Yuma came to this world, and from Chika about her true feelings.

episodes.title: Tamakoma's A-Class Members
episodes.plot: Osamu, Yuma and Chika decide to join Tamakoma branch to go to Neighbor world as A-rank agents of the expedition force. They go into rigorous training from Tamakoma First Unit in order to become A-rank agents.

episodes.title: Border Top Teams
episodes.plot: Commander Kido fears that Tamakoma branch will become too powerful. He orders A-rank agents who belong to the headquarters to take Yuma's black trigger.

episodes.title: NO. 1 Attacker: Kei Tachikawa
episodes.plot: Jin fights against A-rank agents led by the number one attacker Kei Tachikawa. He finally uses his black trigger Fu-jin.

episodes.title: Black Trigger Fujin
episodes.plot: The battle between Jin and A-rank agents is fierce. Arashiyama Unit receives directions from their superior Shinoda, and covers Jin.

episodes.title: A Future in Progress
episodes.plot: Commander Kido was shocked to hear the report that Jin beat the A-rank agents. And then, Jin shows up in the headquarters and offers him a big deal.

episodes.title: Official Border Enlistment
episodes.plot: Yuma and Chika are officially enlisted in Border. They become famous by their own skills. Meanwhile, an A-rank attacker Soya Kazama challenges Osamu to a solo match.

episodes.title: Osamu Mikumo versus Soya Kazama
episodes.plot: Osamu fought against Kazama in over 20 solo matches, but never won a single one. What Kazama said motivates him, and they fight a match again.

episodes.title: Rank Battle! Shun Midorikawa's Plan
episodes.plot: Rumors spread that Osamu and Kazama drew their match, that makes Osamu uncomfortable. An A-rank attacker Shun Midorikawa intentionally gathers an audience and challenges Osamu to a solo match in front of them.

episodes.title: Clash! Yuma vs. Midorikawa
episodes.plot: Yuma and Midorikawa start to fight 10 solo matches. Yuma noticed his malice towards Osamu and ready to fight. Meanwhile, Commander Kido holds a meeting to prepare for the expected major invasion from Neighbor world.

episodes.title: Neighbor World
episodes.plot: Border formulates a strategy against the enemy invasion based on the information they receive from Replica. Jin foresees Osamu's danger in near the future through his own side effect, and he asks Miwa for help.

episodes.title: The Large-Scale Invasion Begins
episodes.plot: One of Neighbors' countries, Aftkrator finally starts to invade Mikado city. They put new drones on the battlefield.

episodes.title: God's Country Aftokrator
episodes.plot: Border has their hands full with the enemy's new drones. When Yuma fights against them, Chano Unit mistakes him as an enemy soldier and shoot him.

episodes.title: Meeden's Baby Birds
episodes.plot: Aftkrator has a strategy to divide Border's force. The drones begin to attack C-rank agents including Chika who are evacuating citizens from a war zone.

episodes.title: The Most Powerful Squad in Border
episodes.plot: The enemy's purpose is to kidnap C-rank agents to get a biological power Trion that Kitora revealed. The enemy's leader Hairein decided to bring in his soldiers Enedra, Lamvanein, Hyuse and Viza. Osamu and Chika are in danger, but the strongest unit in Border comes to their rescue!

episodes.title: Fierce Fight! Enedora vs Kazama Squad
episodes.plot: Kazama Unit struggles with Enedra because he uses a black trigger Vorvoros.

episodes.title: Border on the Counterattack
episodes.plot: Tamakoma First Unit fights against Hyuse and Viza to help C-rank agents including Osamu and Chika to flee to the HQ. Meanwhile, a joint team made up of several units fights against Lamvanein.

episodes.title: The Organon User
episodes.plot: The leader of Tamakoma First, Reiji Kizaki orders his teammates Kyosuke "Torimaru" Karasuma and Kirie Konami to save people, and confronts the enemy alone. Viza recognizes him as an excellent soldier and uses his black trigger Organon.

episodes.title: A Crossroads of Fate
episodes.plot: Hyuse and Viza chased after Chika, but Jin and Yuma catch up with them and block their path. Osamu and Karasuma try to take Chika and C-rank agents to the HQ. Meanwhile, the HQ has been invaded by Enedra.

episodes.title: Tekisho Hairein
episodes.plot: Suwa Unit fights against Enedra by locking him in a virtual training room that made of Trion because they can analyze his weakness as they are fighting. Meanwhile, Hairein finally appears in front of Chika.

episodes.title: Osamu Mikumo's Determination
episodes.plot: Hairein has turned Chika into a Trion cube using his trigger. Osamu takes it, and heads for the HQ. Meanwhile, Shinoda tries to join the battle against Enedra.

episodes.title: Implacable Enedra
episodes.plot: Shinoda fights against Enedra. How will he counter his Vorvoros?

episodes.title: Hairein's Terror
episodes.plot: Karasuma uses his personal trigger Geist against Hairein. He can gain strength and speed, but he has only 200 seconds left to be able to fight.

episodes.title: Fierce Combat! The Battle of the Best
episodes.plot: Miwa uses a trigger Lead Bullet against Hairein. Meanwhile, Yuma decides to carry out a desperate attack against Viza.

episodes.title: The End of the Battle
episodes.plot: Yuma defeated Viza, but he has a few Trion left. Miwa was moved away from Osamu by Mira's trigger. Now there are only seven seconds left until the turning point of the future!

episodes.title: The Have-Not
episodes.plot: Aftkrator withdrew from our world and the 2nd large-scale invasion is over. Although Chika was saved, Osamu lost conscious. Osamu remembers why he joined Border in his dream.

episodes.title: Hero and Partner
episodes.plot: Osamu becomes conscious, and talks with Yuma after hearing the situation from his mother and Chika. One of higher-ups Karasawa takes him to the press conference by Border.

episodes.title: B-rank Rank Wars Begin
episodes.plot: Many journalists ask the higher-ups of Border about responsibility for damage caused by the battle. Osamu hears about Netsuki's plan from Karasawa, and then he steps forward in front of the journalists and speaks his thoughts.

episodes.title: Suwa Squad & Arafune Squad
episodes.plot: Yuma and Chika won their first Rank Battle as Tamakoma Second Unit in front of injured Osamu. Their next opponents are the 8th place, Suwa Unit, and the 10th place, Arafune Unit. Osamu can't decide what tactics to use against them.

episodes.title: Start-Up! Mikumo Unit
episodes.plot: Osamu recovered and rejoined his unit. Tamakoma Second had the right to choose the location this time, and they chose an urban stage with difference of elevation that snipers like.

episodes.title: The Brash Rookie
episodes.plot: The match seemed that it would favor the unit with the most snipers, but Arafune Unit is being driven into a corner by rest of two units. Arafune used to be an attacker, so he launches an attack on Yuma, with a sword type trigger Kogetsu.

episodes.title: Ko Murakami of Suzunari First
episodes.plot: Tamakoma Second's next opponents are the 13th place, Nasu Unit, and the 9th place, Suzunari First Unit. Yuma gets a chance to challenge the attacker of Suzunari First, Kou Murakami to a solo match.

episodes.title: Nasu Unit's Choice
episodes.plot: Murakami's side effect is especially troublesome issue. Osamu thinks about how to prepare for the next Rank Battle.

episodes.title: A Battle in Bad Weather
episodes.plot: The Rank Battle started. Nasu Unit takes tactical actions as planned in the storm. However, Chika's sniping changes the whole situation.

episodes.title: The Thing That Decides the Battle
episodes.plot: The agents have been divided into east and west across the river. On the west side, a three-way battle between the attackers begins.

episodes.title: The Ace's Willpower
episodes.plot: On the east side, Kuruma and Betsuyaku are at the mercy of Nasu's shooting. Osamu doesn't want them to be defeated faster than him, so he support them. On the west side, Yuma enjoys fighting with Murakami.

episodes.title: The Captain's Pride
episodes.plot: Chika breaks the bank of the river by her sniping, and draws the water into the city. Osamu wants Yuma to join him as soon as possible.

episodes.title: And Towards Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Tamakoma Second Unit made it to the top group in B-rank. However, Osamu worries that he has scored only one point on his own in the battles.

episodes.title: The Prisoner from Aftokrator
episodes.plot: Osamu looks back at the Rank Battles they fought so far. Meanwhile, the higher-ups of Border summon Yuma and Hyuse to make a deal.

episodes.title: No. 1 Shooter: Masataka Ninomiya
episodes.plot: An unexpected person reveals why Aftkrator invaded our world and needed Chika. Later, the number one shooter in B-rank Masataka Ninomiya visits Tamakoma Branch to ask Osamu and Chika some questions about her brother Rinji and his former teammate Hatohara. Osamu tells him what he knows.

episodes.title: Sharpened Fangs
episodes.plot: Osamu, Yuma and Chika begins to train hard in preparation for the next Rank Battle against the top units. Chika gets to know the sniper of Kageura Unit, Yuzuru Ema. Meanwhile, Murakami introduces Yuma to the attacker Masato Kageura.

episodes.title: The Battle of the B-Rank Top Teams
episodes.plot: Yuma found Kageura to be a great attacker without fighting, he is a difficult opponent due to his side effect. Meanwhile, Arashiyama, Izumi, and Yuiga train Osamu to be a better shooter, so he grows in self-confidence.

episodes.title: The Targeted Tamakoma
episodes.plot: The Rank Battle started. Ninomiya Unit, Kageura Unit and Azuma Unit have their own good tactics that bother Tamakoma Second. Meanwhile, Hyuse and Jin make a big bet while watching the match on TV.

episodes.title: Battle Royal
episodes.plot: Azuma's excellent sniping puts Tamakoma Second in a tight spot. Chika tries to overcome her weakness. Yuma is stuck in a battle with 4 attackers.

episodes.title: Captain's Duty
episodes.plot: Yuma fights a duel with Kageura, and Ninomiya attacks the two using the tracking bullets. Osamu thinks how to fulfill his duty as a leader after the battle.

episodes.title: A New Threat
episodes.plot: Commander Kido and Shinoda discuss the possibility of upcoming invasion with A-rank unit leaders. Border secretly forms defense teams consisting of several A-rank units based on Jin's prediction and the information from Enedra. Meanwhile, Osamu realizes who Jin suggested as a new member of Tamakoma Second.

episodes.title: The Evolving Mikumo Unit
episodes.plot: Ema invites Chika to Kageura Unit operation room and teaches her how to snipe using a trigger Lead Bullet. Osamu and Yuma learn more about Aftkrator and Hyuse from Enedra.

episodes.title: To the Future
episodes.plot: Osamu learns how to use a trigger Spider from Kitora. Tamakoma Second continues to prepare for the next Rank Battle while a vassal state of Aftkrator, Galopoula, plans to attack the Border HQ.
